sense.def:
The style of something
je splošen način, kako nekaj naredimo ali predstavimo.

seg.quote: Some people find our leisurely style of decision-making rather frustrating.

gramGrp.pos:
COUNT N
or
UNCOUNT N
with
SUPP

sense.def:
Someone's style
so človekova splošna stališča in običajno vedênje.

seg.quote: In characteristic style, he peered over his glasses.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
has style
, je dobro urejen in eleganten.

seg.quote: Both were rather short and plump, but they had style.
Here you can eat in style.

sense.def:
The style of a product
je oblika nekega izdelka.

seg.quote: These pants come in several styles.
The clothes I wore weren't different in style or appearance from those of the other children.

sense.def:
To style clothing or someone's hair
pomeni zasnovati ali oblikovati oblačila ali pričesko nekomu.

seg.quote: Her hair was styled in a short cropped pony tail.
